alert.note: Alert for Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 11:18PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT THAYER COUNTY THROUGH 1145 PM CDT... At 1117 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms across much of Thayer County. Movement was generally north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hebron, Deshler, Chester, Alexandria, Carleton, Hubbell, Belvidere, and Gilead. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
